mapper.insert: insert into knowledge_points (id, discipline_id, name, description_url, grade_id, semester_id, frequency_of_exams, creator_id, creation_time, update_operator_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{disciplineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descriptionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{semesterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{frequencyOfExams,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateOperatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update knowledge_points set discipline_id = #{disciplineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description_url = #{descriptionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade_id = #{gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, semester_id = #{semesterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, frequency_of_exams = #{frequencyOfExams,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_operator_id = #{updateOperatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, discipline_id, name, description_url, grade_id, semester_id, frequency_of_exams, creator_id, creation_time, update_operator_id, update_time from knowledge_points where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
